source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.
source_objects.title: 3D & Animation

items.title: 3D Master, from zero to hero Vol.4: Body Anatomy
items.headline: Understands the bases of the Human Anatomy for the creation of high quality 3D characters.
objectives_summary: You will learn techniques which will help you build the right proportions for your characters.
You will apply the concepts of human anatomy to the torso.
You will apply the concepts of human anatomy to the arms.

items.title: Blackmagic Fusion - The Ultimate Guide 2019

items.headline: Learn Rotoscoping in details, Compositing and Keying, Color Correction, Tracking, 3D Compositing and much more
objectives_summary: This course will help you to learn about the fundamentals of node-based compositing using Fusion,
This course will also help you to learn about how to import media supported in Fusion and would also give you knowledge with working on the basic nodes and its parameters.

items.title: Basics of Flash Animation
items.headline: Learn Flash Animation in easy steps.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be able to do simple flash animations, give life to a character and get ready for next level of animations.

items.headline: Learn to model and texture trees and foliage using 3ds Max - and set up Master Foliage materials in the UDK game engine!
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of creating grass, brush, and trees for use in games from start to finish
Learn to implement foliage properly into UDK and make it come alive
Learn how to create master shaders for similar types of assets

items.title: Make Motion Comics
items.headline: Animate Your Comics + Illustrations In Adobe Photoshop, After Effects + Character Animator
objectives_summary: turn your illustrations and comic artwork into films
use Photoshop to animate comic illustrations through frame by frame animation
use Character Animator to do motion capture animation with synchronized audio

items.headline: Learn Maya's powerful modeling tools and master professional techniques for hard surface modeling
objectives_summary: How to use Maya.

How to master professional modeling techniques.

items.title: Cut-out animation in Blender
items.headline: Cut-out animation using the CoaTools in Blender.
objectives_summary: After the course you will be able to animate any image and create your own motion comic.
You will learn how to create animation in the same technique, as it was used for creating Pepper & Carrot Motion Comic.

items.title: Introduction to 3Ds Max
items.headline: series of courses from beginner to professional and money making level
objectives_summary: To easily work with 3Ds max , control everything inside any 3D scene . Creating 3D models in minimum time possible . This course is the beginning of a course series and at the end of all you will be able to create any object you in a short time with high quality and make high quality renders and images for it . Generally you will be able to sit home and earn money by creating 3d models online .
